attributes.additional_details: Russian invasion to the Ukraine demonstrates disastrous economic consequences of what it means to be dependent on someone’s natural resources. Russian economy is heavily dependent on natural resources with oil and natural gas accounting for 36% of the country's total budget. By starving Russia of income from oil and natural gas would likely to bring the Putin’s regime to collapse and save our planet from total destruction.
attributes.background: Stop buying Russia’s fossil fuels. By paying money to Russia for the oil and natural gas means contributing to the killing of Ukrainian people and destructing the country’s infrastructure.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289
